price: 82 Gloire au Seigneur des cieux et de la terre, Seigneur du Trône que leurs blasphèmes ne sauraient toucher !
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbi al-samāwāti wal-arḍi rabbi al-ʿarshi ʿammā yaṣifūna
